title: Railworks TS2014 SSS Steam Era Carriage Sound Pack
description:
This is Steam Sounds Supreme Steam Era Carriage Sound Pack

Bring the steam age to life with the Steam Era Carriage Sound Pack.

Adds brand new sounds to many of the carriages available for TS2013/14 including:

Formerly default Kuju Mark 1's - blue & grey and SR green; Falmouth, Woodhead, WLoS, A4 Pack and Digital Traction Mark 1's; Digital Traction LNER Teak carriages - all liveries; Making Tracks LMS Period 3 coaches and Making Tracks GW Collett coaches.

The following new sounds will be added:
- Realistic Rail Joint Sounds
- Authentic Flange Squeal
- Running Sound
- Brake Grind
- Wheel 'Flat' Added to a Select Few Vehicles
- Running Sound
- Brake Grind
- Wheel 'Flat' Added to a Select Few Vehicles



Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
